name: Archipelle
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 264 by me, OctoDice.

Theme : Many Island

Controls :

grid base walk : Arrows

get in/out boat : space bar

toggle map : M

My personal objectif with this game jam was to learn Godot in 1 week.

The name is based on a french pun, this is the mix between archipel (archipelago or islands) and pelle (shovel).
